item.title: The 10 Best Songs Heard at Fall 2016 Fashion Weeks
item.description:
The 10 Best Songs Heard at Fall 2016 Fashion Weeks

You know about the sights of Fashion Week, but what about the sounds? Those remixes, song debuts, and runway anthems tend to get lost in the ether in the hubbub of fashion month. Not to fret, eight Vogue.com staffers have picked the best songs heard during the Fall 2016 season, from Madonna to Sonic Youth, compiled in a handy playlist below.

item.title: Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs
item.description:
Saint Laurent Stars: Why Amal, Angelina, and More Fell for Hedi Slimane's Designs

In his four years as creative director of Saint Laurent, Hedi Slimane managed to craft a highly compelling vision for the French house, one that gave louche Parisian elegance a distinctive rock 'n' roll beat.
